name: Hawke Network Systems
tag_list: hosting, web, reseller, support, cheap, affordable, unlimited, cpanel, fantastico, livechat
overview:
Hawkenet.com was founded by two friends who shared a common passion in creating a one of a kind online business with shared values. Our experienced staff both have personal and professional experience in addition to degrees in Computer Information Systems with a concentration in both Security and Web/ Graphic Design. Since our launch we have kept our mission simple. We will provide exceptional products at competitive prices to match our top of the line support and powerful servers. We are a very hardworking team ready to help you kick off your business into a new level! Hawkenet.com will never share or sell your information to any company! We are a very honest team and will never pull any gimmicks. Absolutely no hidden fees, no startup fees, and absolutely no contracts!

With all these other companies out there why pick us?

Our main goal is simple, to provide clients with top of the line products and amazing support. Since we have been doing this for a long time we are fast at hitting a problem head on and fixing it immediately. We have our top of the line trained support staff that you are able to contact with any concerns or questions 24/7 guaranteed!
